text: Mike Laird (born July 1, 1974, Portsmouth, Virginia) is an American professional BMX rider. He won the PlayStation Trick of the Year Award during the first ever AST Dew Tour. Laird was nominated for his double-tailwhip 360 in BMX Park Finals at Denver's Right Guard Open. Laird is also a character in the Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX games. ==References== Category:BMX riders Category:1974 births Category:Living people
title: Mike Laird
